document_data.name: Mystic Cornucopia
document_data.mainbody: The '''Mystic Cornucopia''' was the most significant temple of [[Isis]] in all of [[Mulhorand]].
document_data.Location: This temple was located near the center of the [[Great Vale]], surrounded by a network of lush farms around where the tributaries of [[Mishtan]] and [[Klondor]] joined to form the [[River of Spears]].
document_data.Structure: The Mystic Cornucopia was a sprawling complex. It stood out from the surroundings by its lush gardens, wide-open terraces, towering pillars, and a great deal of pools and streams. The temple also had vast storehouses containing grain and seeds.
document_data.Activities: The [[priest]]esses of this temple administered most of the great farms in the valley.
